name: Volume Booster
description: Easy Volume Control gives you the best and easiest way to control all your volumes of your phones audio devices:  * Quick boosting of playback volume. * Quick configuration of the volumes of Ring, Notification, Voice call, Media, Alarm and System. * Quick Switching to silent or vibration mode. * Remember the settings and adjust the volumes automatically when your phone is turned on. * Remember the settings with or without headset and adjust the volumes when your headphone is plug in or pull out.
